headline: Is Old Dominion Freight Line’s Recent 20% Drop a Chance for Investors in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Old Dominion Freight Line is a bargain after everything that has happened in the market lately? Let’s dig into whether its current price actually stacks up to its business quality. The stock has seen a bit of a ride this year, dropping 20.5% year-to-date, though it did bounce back 4.0% over the past week after a tough 12 months with a 35.7% decline. Recent headlines have centered on the slowing freight demand across the trucking industry and the ongoing...

headline: Old Dominion Freight Line Provides Update for Fourth Quarter 2025
summary: THOMASVILLE, N.C., December 02, 2025--Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (Nasdaq: ODFL) today reported certain less-than-truckload ("LTL") operating metrics for November 2025. Revenue per day decreased by 4.4% as compared to November 2024 due to a 10.0% decrease in LTL tons per day that was partially offset by an increase in LTL revenue per hundredweight. The decrease in LTL tons per day was attributable to a 9.4% decrease in LTL shipments per day and a 0.6% decrease in LTL weight per shipment. For

Revenue per day decreased by 4.4% as compared to November 2024 due to a 10.0% decrease in LTL tons per day that was partially offset by an increase in LTL revenue per hundredweight.
